mapper.delete: delete from shopcat where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and isbn=#{isbn}
mapper.select: select id, `uid`, isbn, quantity from shopcat

SELECT shopcat.id,shopcat.uid,shopcat.isbn,shopcat.quantity,book.id,book.bookname,book.author,book.price,book.categorynumber,book.isbn,img FROM shopcat LEFT JOIN book on shopcat.isbn=book.isbn where uid=#{uid}
